text: Patuakhali Government College () is a educational institution in Patuakhali district of Barisal division.আমাদের বরিশাল Thousands of students study here. The college has two academic buildings, one building for examinations and two hostels. ==Academic departments== ==Accidents== * Hostel Floor Collapsed. ==Related pages== *List of colleges in Bangladesh ==References== Category:Colleges and universities in Bangladesh Category:1957 establishments in Asia Category:20th-century establishments in Bangladesh
title: Patuakhali Government College
